query.statement: UPDATE SAPHEE.ZCST136 SET CS136_MGB = 'Y', CS136_MSA = '00', CS136_MDT = HEX(CURRENT DATE), UPDAT = HEX(CURRENT DATE), -- BS ETL 연계를 위한 식별컬럼 추가. 2020.11.30 Han J.H UPZET = HEX(CURRENT TIME) -- BS ETL 연계를 위한 식별컬럼 추가. 2020.11.30 Han J.H WHERE MANDT = #G_MANDT# AND CS136_PJT = #PJT# AND CS136_HNO = #HNO# AND CS136_SEQ = #SEQ# AND CS136_GND = #GND# AND CS136_JYM >= SUBSTR(#JYM#,1,6) AND VALUE(CS136_SDT,'') = '' AND CS136_PST != 'A6'
